channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Y S?n
channel.desc: Awn i un o syrcasau cyfoes mwyaf Ewrop gyda Trystan Chambers, a chawn gip ar waith yr argraffwr Elin Crowley. We're at the Celtic Deaf Festival and see glass-work at Swansea School of Art.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Am Dro!
channel.desc: Y tro hwn, cawn deithiau i Nant Gwrtheyrn, Rhoscolyn, Blaengarw a Ceunant Clydach, gyda Zoe, Islwyn, Jordan a Helen. Four walks, four competitors but only one winner. It's time to go Am Dro.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Yr Ynys
channel.desc: Beti George sydd yn mynd ? ni ar daith i gwrdd ? rhai o drigolion Cyprus - y Groegwyr yn y de a'r Twrciaid yn y gogledd. Beti George takes us to Cyprus to meet Greeks and Turks living there.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Darn Bach o Hanes
channel.desc: Dewi Prysor sy'n edrych ar sut mae pobl wedi manteisio ar ein hadnodd naturiol mwyaf toreithiog - dwr. Dewi Prysor looks at how we use one of our most abundant natural resources - water.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ffermio
channel.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn am faterion cefn gwlad. Weekly countryside and farming magazine.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
channel.desc: Rhifyn omnibws yn edrych n?l ar ddigwyddiadau yng Nghwmderi dros yr wythnos ddiwethaf. Omnibus edition looking back at events in Cwmderi over the past week. With on-screen English subtitles.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
channel.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Hafiach
channel.desc: Wrth i arholiadau criw o ddisgyblion orffen mae'n amser dathlu, ond ceir darganfyddiad erchyll cyn pen dim. Themau aeddfed. A horrible discovery befalls some GCSE revellers. Adult themes.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Joe Allen
channel.desc: Rhaglen yn dilyn Joe Allen wrth iddo wynebu penderfyniad caletaf ei yrfa - dal ati i chwarae neu cerdded i ffwrdd. Documentary following Joe Allen through a season like no other.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Radio Fa'ma
channel.desc: Pobol Dyffryn Aman sy'n rhannu eu straeon tro 'ma wrth i Tara a Kris yrru carafan 'Radio Fa'ma' i Waun-Cae-Gurwen. The people of the Amman Valley share their stories with the duo this time.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Dylan ar Daith
channel.desc: Dylan Iorwerth sy'n dilyn taith Y Gohebydd, John Griffith, radical a chyfathrebwr pwysig yn ei oes. The journey of radical and communicator John Griffith - from Wales to London and America.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Bois y Rhondda
channel.desc: Yn y rhaglen hon, mae'r bois yn mynd i gampio - gydag ambell un yn ymdopi'n well na'r lleill. In this episode, the boys go camping - but how will they cope sleeping under the stars.
